To:
ATISH/LYNN HU
GD DAY!
RE: MV APJ SHIRIN
PLS KINDLY CHEK IF ANY INT:
ACCT: MERIT MARINE LTD
DWT: SMAX - UMAX
DEL: TM E KALI, INDONEISA
1TCT WITH BULK CGO INT COAL
L/C: 7-12TH SEP
RDEL: N CHINA
3.75ADD PUS
BEST REGARDS
LYNN HU 胡琳琳
CHARTERING BROKER
DIR: +86 23 6780 4909
MOB: +86 158 2595 7020
SKYPE ID: JOINOCEANCQ17@FOROCEANSHIPPING.NET
Pls cc to handypanamax@joinocean.cn for safe receipt.
To reply your last original emails asf       >>>>>>
From: Trinity-Ship Brokers <dry@trinity-ship.com>
Sent: 2024/8/22 14:13:47
To:
Subject: TONNAGE OPENS AT N. ASIA OPEN END AUG
Dear Sir / Atish
Greetings of the Day !!
CLOSE & DIRECT //
MV ZH CHANG XING 61,205 MT BLT 2014 OPEN LIANYUNGANG 29-30 AUG 2024
MV APJ SHIRIN 56,556 MT BLT 2012 OPEN YANGPU,CHINA 26-31 AUG 2024
MV AMOY DREAM 63,878 MT BLT 2017 OPEN KAMIISO 28-30 AUG 2024
MV. ZH CHANG XING
Built 2014
Building Yard : Nantong COSCO KHI
Geared Bulk Carrier
Dwat: 61.205on 13,04 m ssw draft
TPC: 60,40
LOA 199,90 mtrs
BEAM 32,24 mtrs
GRT / NRT (International): 34612 / 20240
5 holds / 5 hatches, hydraulic-folding hatchcovers
4 x 35 mts electro-hydraulic cranes
Grab fitted with 4 x 12 cbm
Total: 77.546,300 CBM grain / 74.157,60 CBM bale
Tanktop strength:
No 1,5: 23,00 mt per sqm
No 2,4: 16,50 mts per sqm
No 3: 24,50 mts per sqm
Speed/Consumption:
Ballast abt 14.00 knots on abt 27.00 MT plus abt 2.00 MT for aux eng. IFO 380cst
Laden abt 13.50 knots on abt 27.50 MT plus abt 2.00 MT for aux eng. IFO 380cst
Port consumption: idle abt 3.50 MT IFO 380cst / working abt 5.50 MT IFO 380cst
ECO speed/consumption - always on WOG basis:
Ballast  : Abt 13.00 kn on abt 20.50 MT plus abt 2.00 MT for aux eng. IFO 380cst
Laden :  Abt 12.00 kn on abt 22.00 MT plus abt 2.00 MT for aux eng. IFO 380cst
Add 0.10 MT MGO per day to all of the above
Vessel has the right to burn mdo while maneuvering in/out of ports and navigating in narrow waters, rivers, channels etc.
Speed and consumption figures are ‘about’ which is applicable to both and jointly to speed And consumption (specifically meaning 0.5 knots for speed and 5pct for consumption), and Both speed and consumption are always calculated only from beginning sea passage to end Sea passage, excluding any voyage up to 48 hours duration, and both speed and consumption
are always subject to good weather conditions for a period of 24 consecutive hours up to Beaufort scale force 4 and Douglas Sea State 3, with combined wave and swell heights not to exceed 1.25 M, no adverse currents, without negative influence of swell, clean bottom, even keel and excl voyages of less than 48 hours.
Periods exceeding the above agreed mentioned good weather conditions and terms are the be Expressly excluded when vessel’s speed evaluation is conducted, no other extrapolation will Be allowed ,EXTRAPOLATION OF “GOOD WEATHER” PERFORMANCE FOR “BAD WEATHER” PERIODS IS NOT ALLOWED . Always subject to good quality of bunkers as agreed herein.
ALL FUELS SUPPLIED SHALL BE HOMOGENOUS AND OF QUALITY SUITABLE FOR BURNING IN THE VESSEL'S ENGINES AND AUXILIARIES AND TO CONFORM TO ISO 8217:2017(E) SPECIFICATIONS (AND ANY AMENDMENTS THERETO) OF QUALITY RMG380 FOR IFO 380CST AND DMA FOR LSMGO. NO MIXING OF FUELS IS ALLOWED.ULO (USED LUBRICATION OIL) OR OTHER WASTE PRODUCTS ARE STRICTLY NOT PERMITTED AND NOT TO BE INCLUDED IN THE FUELS SUPPLIED. LSMGO SUPPLIED TO HAVE MAX SULPHUR CONTENT OF 0.1%.OWS HAS THE RIGHT TO SET OFF THE SPEED LOSS AGAINST THE BUNKER SAVED,VICE VERSE.
Charterers are not allowed to mix different supplies of IFO, or MDO, in the same bunker tanks, however charterers are allowed to mix different supplies of LSMGO in the same bunker tanks (provided same grade).
All details about
APJ SHIRIN
FLAG PANAMA.
BLT MAY 12, COSCO GUANGZHOU , CHINA
HO/HA 5/5,
DWT 56556 MT ON 12.80 M (S),
LOA/BEAM/TPC 189.99/32.26, 58.8(S)
GT/NT 32987/19221
GRAIN/ BALE 71634.09 / 68,200
MAX.SAFE SPEED:
BALLAST ABT 12.50  KNOTS/ VLSFO ABT 24 MT
LADEN ABT 12.00 KNOTS/ VLSFO ABT 26 MT
ECO SPEED:
BALLAST ABT 11.00 KNOTS/ VLSFO ABT 20 MT
LADEN ABT 10.50 KNOTS/ VLSFO ABT 23 MT
IDLE - ABT 2.20  MT VLSFO  + ABT 0.20 MT LSMGO
WITH CARGO GEAR - ABT 4.50 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.20 LSMGO
4 X 30 METRIC TONS SWL CRANES AND 4 X 12CBM REMOTE CONTROLLED GRABS
IF GRABS USED  SWL OF CRANES WILL BE CONSIDERED AS 24 MT
GRABS TO OPERATE WITH 12CBM CAPACITY SUBJECT TO DENSITY OF CARGO.
ALL DETAILS ABOUT
ALL SPEED AND CONSUMPTION FIGURES ARE AVERAGE FIGURES DURING C/P PERIOD. ALL SPEED AND ALL CONSUMPTION FIGURES ARE TO BE CONSIDERED AS 'ABOUT'.
AT SEA PERFORMANCE FIGURES,ONLY APPLY ON GOOD WEATHER DAYS (OF A MINIMUM 24 CONSECUTIVE HOURS) AND ANY OF THE FOLLOWING DAYS ARE EXCLUDED FROM ANY WARRANTY AS TO THE VESSELS SPEED AND PERFORMANCE:
THOSE IN WHICH WEATHER CONDITION EXCEEDS EITHER IN  SEABUOY TO SEABUOY IN MODERATE WEATHER UPTO/INCLUDING BEAUFORT 4.DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 AND SIGNIFICANT WAVE AND SWELL HEIGHT OF 1.25M OR GREATER OR THOSE IN WHICH THERE ARE NEGATIVE INFLUENCES OF SWELL OR THOSE IN WHICH THERE ARE ADVERSE CURRENTS. NO ADVERSE CURRENT. NO FAVORABLE CURRENTS TO BE TAKEN INTO ACCOUNT WHEN CALCULATING THE VESSEL'S PERFORMANCE.
ALL DETAILS “ABOUT” WHICH IS UNDERSTOOD TO MEAN A 0.5 KNOTS TOLERANCE AND A 5% ALLOWANCE ON BUNKER CONSUMPTION, BOTH IN VESSEL'S FAVOR. IN THE EVENT THAT ANY SPEED/PERFORMANCE CLAIM IS MADE, OWNERS ARE ENTITLED TO OFFSET THE VALUE OF ANY BUNKER SAVINGS MADE BY CHARTERERS BELOW THE UPPER LIMIT OF THE WARRANTED CONSUMPTION. POSITIVE CURRENTS NOT TO BE CONSIDERED FOR ANALYSING PERFORMANCE.
VLSFO 380 CST CLASS RMG 380 MAX SULPHUR CONTENT 0.50 % / DIESEL CLASS DMA MAX SULPHUR CONTENT 0.10 % , BOTH GRADES AS PER ISO 8217, 2017 OR LATEST EDITION. NO USED LUBRICANTS TO BE PRESENT IN FUEL NO COMINGLING OF DIFFERENT FUEL BATCHES IN TANKS ALLOWED "VESSEL USE VLSFO /LSMGO AS PER DESCRIPTION. VLSFO/LSMGO IS USED FOR STARTING/STOPPING OF AUX-ENGINES AND AUX-BOILERS. MAIN ENGINE IS CHANGED TO LSMGO WHEN MAINTENANCE IS REQUIRED TO BE DONE ON FUEL SYSTEM ON RARE OCCASIONS M/E IS CHANGED TO LSMGO WHILE MANOEUVRING IN NARROW WATERS.
THE PARTIES UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT WHEN NAVIGATING ANY ECA (EMMISION CONTROL AREA), THE VESSEL IS OBLIGED TO CONSUME LSMGO IN LIEU OF VLSFO AND AS SUCH, THE VESSELS PERFORMANCE SHALL BE AFFECTED. AS A RESULT, NONE OF THE PERFORMANCE WARRANTIES IN THIS C/P RELATING TO THE VESSELS SPEED AND/OR CONSUMPTION SHALL BE APPLICABLE TO PERIODS IN WHICH THE VESSEL IS NAVIGATING ANY ECA; AND ANY PERIOD NAVIGATING ANY ECA SHALL BE EXCLUDED FROM ANY SPEED OR PERFORMANCE CALCULATION.
NAME: M/V AMOY DREAM
TYPE: BULK CARRIER
CLASS: BV
BUILT: 2017, TSUNEISHI ZHOUSHAN
FLAG: HONG KONG
SUMMER DEADWEIGHT/DRAFT/TPC: 63,878MT / 13.32M / 61.34M
LOA/BEAM: 199.9M / 32.26M
GRT/NRT: 35,606 / 21,466
GRAIN/BALE (CBM): 79,014.7 / 76,191
HO/HA: 5 / 5
GEARS: 4 SETS X 30MT DECK CRANE + 4 SETS X 13CBM GRABS
SPEED/CONS: IS GIVEN IN GOOD FAITH, UNDER 24 CONSECUTIVE HOURS OF GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS NOT EXCEEDING BF4 AND DSS 3 (SIGNIFICANT HEIGHT MAX 1.25M) WITH NO ADVERSE CURRENT (FAVORABLE CURRENT IN OWNERS’ BENEFIT) AND WITH NO NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL, AND ALWAYS EXCLUDING BALLASTING/DEBALLASTING OPERATIONS.
LADEN - ABOUT 13.5KNOTS ON ABOUT 28.0MT VLSFO + ABOUT 0.2MT LSMGO
BALLAST - ABOUT 14.0KNOTS ON ABOUT 28.0MT VLSFO + ABOUT 0.2MT LSMGO
ECO SPEED
LADEN - ABOUT 12.0KNOTS ON ABOUT 17.7MT VLSFO + ABOUT 0.2MT LSMGO
BALLAST - ABOUT 12.5KNOTS ON ABOUT 17.7MT VLSFO + ABOUT 0.2MT LSMGO
IN PORT: IDLE ABOUT 3.3MT VLSFO + ABOUT 0.4MT LSMGO
WORKING 24 HOURS ABOUT 4.9MT VLSFO + ABOUT 0.4MT LSMGO
“ABOUT” IS DEFINED AS 5% MORE ON BUNKER CONSUMPTION AND 0.5 KNOTS LESS ON VESSEL’S SPEED.
STRICTLY NO COMINGLING OF BUNKERS PERMITTED UNLESS OTHERWISE EXPRESSLY ALLOWED BY HEAD OWNERS.
OWNERS BUNKER SPECS TO ALWAYS APPLY, UNLESS OTHERWISE EXPRESSLY PERMITTED BY HEAD OWNERS
IFO SPECS: RMG380 ISO 8217:2010 MAX 0.5% SULPHUR M/M
MGO SPECS: DMA ISO 8217:2010 MAX 0.1% SULPHUR M/M
THE VESSEL HAS THE LIBERTY TO CONSUME LSMGO WHILE MANEUVERING, IN/OUT OF PORTS, STARTING OF A/E, NAVIGATING IN SHALLOW/RESTRICTED/BUSY WATER, CANALS AND RIVERS.
ALL DETAILS ABOUT AND WITHOUT GUARANTEE.
Best regards
Ravindra Porwal
